title: Waiting For Punchline Trailer (DOCUMENTARY AVAILABLE NOW!)
description:
Go watch it now at http://www.kindafunny.com/punchline


Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

transcript_chunks.text: hey everyone waiting for the punchline the documentary that follows my standup Journey from open micro to potentially being up at the historic punchline comedy club is out right now you guys can go check it out uh go to kindof funny.com punchline follow that link it'll take you all the way there and once you've watched it tweet at me and let me know what you think uh a lot of people worked really hard on it we're very very proud of it and I want everyone out there to see it a lot of YouTube stars get really big then they go I'm a comedian you know and they fail miserably like I remember telling one of my friends I'm like everyone always says it takes like 10 years to get good at this but I am a podcaster and maybe you don't understand what that means sir and I went up and I uh comedy is crazy hard comedy is relatable stand up comedy is a conversation between the audience and the only way to figure out what that is is just to do it over and over and over and stop and then get up again

hard comedy is relatable stand up comedy is a conversation between the audience and the only way to figure out what that is is just to do it over and over and over and stop and then get up again and be like okay okay well what did I learn from that I pulled my car over and a girl got into my back seat because she thought I was her Uber yeah and she looked at me and I looked at her and neither of us knew who was supposed to be scared in that situation and uh it turns out it still gets to be her it does yeah the goal of the next year or two for me is getting past the punchline punchline that's like the Pinnacle it's kind of like uh the mecca of comedy in San Francisco kind of funny is a big enough player in the entertainment Market that Nick could take a lot of shortcuts with his stand up C if he wanted to when I started doing comedy I wanted to do it right and I've always wanted to do this the way that Nick does it where his Grassroots like making it happen that like blows my mind I

C if he wanted to when I started doing comedy I wanted to do it right and I've always wanted to do this the way that Nick does it where his Grassroots like making it happen that like blows my mind I admire people who don't have the platform that I have who still go out there every day and Chase down that dream stand up comedy is the only context in which a man's ever told me that he loves how wonderfully dry I am go with your vocal Rhythm just remember the Rule 25 words or less to the last one of the realities that I had to face was that this is going to take a really long time 1 2 3 step it's really tough to make it out here and show business is very unforgiving is he asleep or is he are you're okay the the meatball sandwich just caught up to you what I'm doing right now is common it's doing clubs it's organizing your own shows trying to promote yourself and that's it that's the blind [Applause]
